issue.title: [Packaging][Crossbow] The windows conda artifacts are not uploaded to GitHub releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6995](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6995). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The artifacts should be uploaded under the appropriate tag: https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/releases/tag/ursabot-289-azure-conda-win-vs2015-py37

Most certainly the artifacts are produced in a different directory than previously, so the uploading script cannot find it https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=2180

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6995?focusedCommentId=17263376) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Seems like it has been fixed in the meantime:
 https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/releases/tag/build-9-azure-conda-win-vs2017-py38
